name: Send new DocuGenerate PDFs as attachments by Email
description:
Every time a new document is created in DocuGenerate, Make will automatically send that document as an email attachment to recipients you specify. 
This workflow streamlines document delivery for contracts, invoices, certificates, event tickets, and more. Learn how to create complete automated workflows in our [event ticket generation tutorial](https://www.docugenerate.com/blog/how-to-create-event-tickets-with-barcodes-using-make/?utm_source=make&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=template_16557).
